TopicTitle: HELP REQUESTS- I can help with your mod! [To an extent, read post]

Articles.Content:
Moderators, go ahead and move this thread, it's not in the right place, is it?

I have tried numerous times to start my own mod, but I have failed because I don't have all the skills required to make these. In addition, every idea I come up with seems to be taken. So instead, I will  help with your mods! Not only is it good for you and your mod, but I can practice modding and hopefully make my own eventually.

I will be taking requests to help make mods, currently I can texture nicely and write part configs. I can also write the descriptions to things (science default, planet info, parts, etc.)

I prefer to work in a stockalike style.

Not sure how long this might take, or how often I can do this. I'll post more information later.

If I like your mod enough, I might work on it without a request and sent it to you. 

You can start requesting now, I guess. PM me if you prefer or just post your request below. I might not be able to do all of these, please remember that.
